pages.text: Modifiers affecting the player's items on death$(br)$(li)$(l)Afterlife$()$(li2)All items you entered with will be restored on death $(li2)Artifacts can be found $(li2)Experience multiplier x0.5$(li)$(l)Phoenix$() $(li2)All items you entered with will be restored on death
$(li)$(l)Beginners Grace$() $(li2)All items you entered with will be restored on death $(li2)No experience on death
